stimulusHtml: The number of people waiting in a line to enter a stadium can be modeled by the function b defined by bt=42cosπ30t+45 for 0≤t≤60, where t is the time, in minutes, since the stadium opened. Based on the graph of the model, which of the following is true?
choicesHtml: The number of people in line is never equal to 0 because the midline vertical shift is greater than the amplitude.
The number of people in line is never equal to 0 because the amplitude is greater than the midline vertical shift.
The number of people in line reaches 0 because the midline vertical shift is greater than the amplitude.
The number of people in line reaches 0 because the amplitude is greater than the midline vertical shift.
